title: Hawaii's Kilauea Volcano Erupts, Firing Lava 100 Meters Into Air
description: Kilauea is one of the world's most active volcanoes, and this is the 32nd time it has erupted since December.
content:
Kīlauea on Hawaii resumed erupting on Tuesday, shooting lava fountains over 100 meters into the air for over 13 hours.
It marked the 32nd eruptive episode for one of the world's most active volcanoe… [+2828 chars]

title: Hawaii's Kilauea volcano erupts again, shooting lava 500 feet into the sky
description: A sprawling crater at the summit of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano erupted again, marking the 32nd episode of volcanic activity at the site since December.
content: Hawaii's Kilauea volcano erupted again this week, spewing lava 500 feet into the air from the crater at its summit, the U.S. Geological Survey said. The eruption ended around 8 p.m. local time on Tue… [+2872 chars]

title: Watch: Lava shoots out of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano in latest eruption
description: Hawaii's Kilauea volcano began erupting again, marking the 32nd episode of eruptive activity since December. Video from the U.S. Geological Survey showed bright red lava flowing out of the volcano on Hawaii's Big Island.
